data.message:
Now, all the people who say this song sucks will suddenly become super #1 fans when it or the future album will get famous and more popular as always and everyone will just go like "oh my god I love Eminem, King of rap, shady's back!" While at the moment 
they're just criticizing this wonderful work and saying this is not a song just cause they don't understand the marvelous work behind it and the fact that basically this ain't  a song, not at all and he didn't want to make an actual song, cause we all know that if he wanted to make a real song with instrumental etc, he would have done it without any kind of problems. 

I really can't stand when "fans" do this. If you're a fan you don't have to like every single song, but at least you have to recognize the potential and not just say "i used to like you, but now I don't like you anymore. You disappointed me" and shit like that. Guys, be coherent.

Btw Campaign speech is amazing, just amazing.
